name: typescript-module-empty-template
description: Bootstrap template for typescript module projects with a full CI/CD set.

scripts.build-prod: npm test && rm -rf lib/* && tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.test: prettier --check 'src/**/*.ts' && npm run build && npm run jesttest && npm run lint && echo 'All tests pass!'
